"What delicacy!" thought the princess. "Is it possible that Amdlie" (Mademoiselle Bouri- enne) "thinks I could be jealous of her, and not value her pure affection and devotion to me?" She went up to her and kissed her warm- ly. Anatole went up to kiss the little princess' hand.
